script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_secondary_sectors CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_secondary_sectors AS SELECT afps.pledge_id, rs.name AS sectorname, rs.amp_sector_id, sum(afps.sector_percentage) AS sector_percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(afps.sector_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_sector afps JOIN all_sectors_with_levels aswl ON afps.amp_sector_id = aswl.amp_sector_id JOIN amp_sector rs ON rs.amp_sector_id = aswl.id0 WHERE aswl.sector_config_name = 'Secondary' GROUP BY afps.pledge_id, rs.amp_sector_id ORDER BY afps.pledge_id;
